short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify your business's attrition rate. We all lose clients & revenue. It happens. But how quickly? Easily calculate it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A SquareTab calculator to identify your revenue and client rates of attrition. Unfortunately, we all lose revenue & clients. It happens. But how quickly is it happening? Easily calculate it now!
